rows.label: qst200222_msg0001
rows.name:
Harghal, what are you doing here?
Won't you tell me everything?

rows.label: qst200222_msg0002
rows.name:
You weren't supposed to
be that kind of girl.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0003
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Those eyes of yours. Just like Dad.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0005
rows.name:
Using Pollen Orbs as ingredients,
I'm making an even more
powerful "Fraudrinco."

rows.label: qst200222_msg0007
rows.name:
Only Nopon eat Pollen Orbs, right? If I
make the effect stronger, turn it into a
drink, people will become obsessed too.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0008
rows.name:
Coming up with something
outrageous like that[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst200222_msg0010
rows.name:
What's wrong, Harghal? Won't
you tell us the rest?

rows.label: qst200222_msg0011
rows.name:
No good. I can't say any more
than this[ML:Dash ] Go home already.

rows.label: qst200222_msg0012
rows.name: Sorry, but I have nothing more to say.
